ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: I too am hatching a plot.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But I too am devising a plan.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and I too am devising a guile.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: but I too plan against them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And I am planning a plan.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And I (too) will make a scheme.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And I plot a plot (against them).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And I am plotting a plot.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and I [too] am devising a plan.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And I am planning a scheme.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And I (too) am planning a plan.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But I am planning a plan.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [86:16] and I [too] am devising a plot, drawing them by degrees [towards destruction] from whence they know not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And I plot a plot (against them)) and I want to kill them, Muhammad, on the Day of Badr.
